name: Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero 3D - Shin Chitose with JAL
name_original: Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero 3D - Shin Chitose with JAL
description:
Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero 3D - Shin Chitose with JAL is a simulation game developed by Sonic Powered. It came out on 25-12-2014. It was published by Sonic Powered.
Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero 3D - Shin Chitose with JAL is available on Nintendo 3DS.
